title: Nothing at all whatsoever to do with type
content:
Anyone who loves little kittens as well as -- or as much as -- Led Zeppelin, might find a lot of humor in this:

[http://www.public.asu.edu/~mharp/viking\_kittens/VikingKitten.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017022804/http:/www.public.asu.edu/~mharp/viking_kittens/VikingKitten.htm "http://www.public.asu.edu/~mharp/viking\_kittens/VikingKitten.htm")
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content: Ok. So it is Friday and I'm easily humored.

Hey, that was rather good ;-)

BTW, I found it to be quite typographic…
But, can you name the typeface? ;^D
